introduction.html:div: The main objective of the VIATRA2 (VIsual Automated model TRAnsformations) framework is to provide a general-purpose support for the entire life-cycle of engineering model transformations including the specification, design, execution, validation and maintenance of transformations within and between various modeling languages and domains.

release_deliverables.html:p: Each release provides development tools and an execution engine VIATRA2 transformations.

target_environments.html:div: VIATRA2 depends on the Platform and offers optional integration with EMF. VIATRA2 has been compiled using Java 1.6 and does not depend on any non-Java libraries.

internationalization.html:div: VIATRA2 does not currently provide support for internationalization.

description.html:div: We are working on making a native EMF version of VIATRA2 that will allow VIATRA2's scalable transformations to be executed directly on EMF models without the necessity for import/export.
We are working on enhancing the performance of VIATRA2 by optimizing the incremental pattern matching engine to enable users to usebig/complex industrial models.
VIATRA2 already has a substantial user community. We are constantly working on extending the VIATRA2 community by publishing examples and tutorials online on the VIATRA2 Eclipse.org wiki.
